College of Dance.name: Colegio de la Danza
College of Dance.description:
Muévete en armonía con el cosmos.

Los bardos del colegio de la danza saben que las palabras de creación no pueden encerrarse en un discurso o una canción: las palabras se pronuncian a través del desplazamiento de los cuerpos celestes y fluyen por los movimientos de las criaturas menores. Estos bardos practican una forma de permanecer en armonía con la vorágine del cosmos que enfatiza la agilidad, la velocidad y la elegancia.

Dazzling Footwork.title: Juego de Pies Deslumbrante
Dazzling Footwork.hint: Este ataque sin armas usa Destreza o Fuerza (la que sea mayor) y usa tu dado de Inspiración Bárdica para el daño en lugar del daño normal.

College of Glamour.name: Colegio del Glamour
College of Glamour.description:
Urde la magia cautivadora de los feéricos.

El colegio del glamour se originó con la magia cautivadora de los Parajes Feéricos. Los bardos que estudian esta magia tejen hilos de belleza y terror en sus canciones e historias y los más poderosos de ellos pueden envolverse en una majestuosidad sobrenatural. Sus actuaciones suscitan el anhelo nostálgico de una inocencia olvidada, evocan los recuerdos inconscientes de temores arraigados y apelan a las emociones incluso de los oyentes más insensibles.

College of Lore.name: Colegio del Conocimiento
College of Lore.description:
Explora las profundidades del conocimiento mágico.

Los bardos del colegio del conocimiento recaban conjuros y secretos de diversas fuentes, como tratados intelectuales, ritos místicos y cuentos de campesinos. Los miembros del colegio se reúnen en bibliotecas y universidades para intercambiar sus conocimientos. También se encuentran en festivales o reuniones de Estado, donde pueden sacar a la luz casos de corrupción, desvelar mentiras o reírse de los vanidosos representantes de la autoridad.

College of Valor.name: Colegio del Valor
College of Valor.description:
Canta las hazañas de los héroes de antaño.

Los bardos del colegio del valor son narradores osados cuyos relatos conservan el recuerdo de los grandes héroes del pasado. Estos bardos cantan las hazañas de sus ídolos en salones abovedados o ante un público reunido en torno a refulgentes hogueras. Viajan para presenciar los grandes acontecimientos de primera mano y asegurarse de que su recuerdo no cae en el olvido. Con sus canciones, inspiran a las nuevas generaciones a lograr hitos similares a los de los héroes de antaño.

Combat Inspiration.name: Inspiración en Combate
Combat Inspiration.description:
Puedes emplear tu ingenio para cambiar las tornas de la batalla. Una criatura que tenga uno de tus dados de Inspiración bárdica podrá usarlo para lograr uno de los siguientes efectos.

Defensa. Cuando una tirada de ataque acierte a la criatura, esta podrá usar su reacción para tirar el dado de Inspiración bárdica y sumar el número obtenido a su CA contra ese ataque, lo que podría hacer que el ataque falle.

Ataque. Inmediatamente después de que la criatura acierte a un objetivo con una tirada de ataque, la criatura puede tirar el dado de Inspiración bárdica y sumar el número obtenido al daño del ataque contra el objetivo.

Combat Superiority.name: Supremacía en Combate
Combat Superiority.description:
Tu experiencia en el campo de batalla ha refinado tus técnicas de combate. Aprendes maniobras que se alimentan de dados especiales llamados Dados de Superioridad.

Maniobras. Aprendes tres maniobras de tu elección de la sección @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFighter000000.JournalEntryPage.Ihf36UhEn91djWwP]{Opciones de Maniobra}. Muchas maniobras mejoran un ataque de alguna manera. Solo puedes usar una maniobra por ataque.

Aprendes dos maniobras adicionales de tu elección cuando alcanzas los niveles 7, 10 y 15 de guerrero. Cada vez que aprendas nuevas maniobras, también puedes reemplazar una maniobra que conozcas por otra diferente.

Dados de Superioridad. Tienes cuatro Dados de Superioridad, que son d8. Un Dado de Superioridad se gasta cuando lo usas. Recuperas todos los Dados de Superioridad gastados cuando finalizas un Descanso Corto o Largo.

Ganas un Dado de Superioridad adicional cuando alcanzas los niveles 7 de guerrero (cinco dados en total) y 15 (seis dados en total).

Tiradas de Salvación. Si una maniobra requiere una tirada de salvación, la CD es igual a 8 más tu modificador de Fuerza o Destreza (a tu elección) y bonificador de competencia.

Nota Foundry

Tus Dados de Superioridad aumentarán automáticamente en cantidad y tipo de dado a medida que subas de nivel.

Commander's Strike.name: Golpe del Comandante
Commander's Strike.description:
Cuando realizas la acción de Ataque en tu turno, puedes reemplazar uno de tus ataques para dirigir a uno de tus compañeros a atacar. Cuando lo haces, elige una criatura dispuesta que pueda verte u oírte y gasta un Dado de Superioridad. Esa criatura puede usar inmediatamente su reacción para hacer un ataque con un arma o un Ataque sin Armas, añadiendo el Dado de Superioridad a la tirada de daño del ataque si acierta.

Nota Foundry

La actividad Ataque Dirigido te permite seleccionar el tipo de daño que debe causar en el diálogo de tirada.

Directed Attack.name: Ataque Dirigido
Directed Attack.condition: Cuando realizas la acción de Ataque en tu turno

Commanding Presence.name: Presencia Dominante
Commanding Presence.description: Cuando realizas una prueba de Carisma (Intimidación, Interpretación o Persuasión), puedes gastar un Dado de Superioridad y añadir ese dado a la tirada.

utility.condition: Cuando realizas una prueba de Carisma (Intimidación, Interpretación o Persuasión)

Contact Patron.name: Contactar con el Patrón
Contact Patron.description:
En el pasado, normalmente contactabas con tu patrón a través de intermediarios. Ahora puedes comunicarte directamente; siempre tienes preparado el conjuro @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplContactOth]{Contactar con Otro Plano}. Con este rasgo, puedes lanzar el conjuro sin gastar un espacio de conjuro para contactar con tu patrón, y automáticamente tienes éxito en la tirada de salvación del conjuro.

Una vez lances el conjuro con este rasgo, no podrás hacerlo de esta manera de nuevo hasta que finalices un Descanso Largo.

Nota Foundry

El conjuro se te otorga automáticamente en este nivel con un uso gratuito.

Controlled Chaos.name: Caos Controlado
Controlled Chaos.description: Obtienes un mínimo de control sobre los estallidos de tu magia salvaje. Siempre que tires en la tabla @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbWildMagicSurg]{Oleada de Magia Salvaje}, puedes tirar dos veces y usar cualquiera de los dos números.

Corona of Light.name: Corona de Luz
Corona of Light.description:
Como acción de magia, haces que emanes un aura de luz solar que dura 1 minuto o hasta que la descartes (no requiere acción). Emites luz brillante en un radio de 18m (60ft) y luz tenue en 9m (30ft) adicionales. Tus enemigos en la luz brillante tienen desventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra tu Resplandor del Alba y cualquier conjuro que cause daño de Fuego o Radiante.

Puedes usar este rasgo una cantidad de veces igual a tu modificador de Sabiduría (mínimo una vez), y recuperas todos los usos gastados cuando finalizas un Descanso Largo.

Nota Foundry

Este rasgo incluye una plantilla de objetivo de 18m para rastrear la luz brillante emitida y un Efecto Activo para marcar criaturas afectadas, pero no automatiza la desventaja.

Cosmic Omen.name: Presagio Cósmico
Cosmic Omen.description:
Siempre que finalices un Descanso Largo, puedes consultar tu Mapa Estelar en busca de presagios y tirar un dado. Hasta que finalices tu siguiente Descanso Largo, obtienes acceso a una reacción especial basada en si obtuviste un número par o impar en el dado:

Dicha (Par). Siempre que una criatura que puedas ver a 9m (30ft) o menos de ti esté a punto de hacer una Prueba d20, puedes usar una reacción para tirar 1d6 y sumar el número obtenido al total.

Desgracia (Impar). Siempre que una criatura que puedas ver a 9m (30ft) o menos de ti esté a punto de hacer una Prueba d20, puedes usar una reacción para tirar 1d6 y restar el número obtenido del total.

Puedes usar esta reacción una cantidad de veces igual a tu modificador de Sabiduría (mínimo una vez), y recuperas todos los usos gastados cuando finalizas un Descanso Largo.

Nota Foundry

Las actividades Dicha y Desgracia consumirán un uso de este rasgo y proporcionarán una tirada de Sumar o Restar.

Weal (Even).name: Dicha (Par)
Weal (Even).condition: Siempre que una criatura que puedas ver a 9m o menos esté a punto de hacer una Prueba d20

Woe (Odd).name: Desgracia (Impar)
Woe (Odd).condition: Siempre que una criatura que puedas ver a 9m o menos de ti esté a punto de hacer una Prueba d20

Countercharm.name: Contraencantamiento
Countercharm.description: Puedes usar notas musicales o palabras de poder para interrumpir efectos que influyen en la mente. Si tú o una criatura a 9m (30ft) o menos de ti falla una tirada de salvación contra un efecto que aplica el estado de Hechizado o Asustado, puedes usar una reacción para hacer que se repita la salvación, y la nueva tirada tiene ventaja.

utility.condition: Tú o una criatura a 9m o menos de ti falla una tirada de salvación contra un efecto que aplica el estado de Hechizado o Asustado

Create Thrall.name: Crear Esclavo
Create Thrall.description:
Puedes lanzar @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonAber]{Invocar Aberración}, puedes modificarlo para que no requiera concentración. Si lo haces, la duración del conjuro se convierte en 1 minuto para ese lanzamiento, y cuando se invoca, la Aberración tiene una cantidad de puntos de golpe temporales igual a tu nivel de brujo más tu modificador por Carisma.

Además, la primera vez en cada turno que la Aberración golpee a una criatura bajo el efecto de tu Maleficio, la Aberración causa daño psíquico extra al objetivo igual al daño de bonificación de ese conjuro.

Nota Foundry

La actividad Daño de Maleficio incluye el daño extra.

La actividad PG Temporales del Esclavo incluye los PG Temporales para aplicar a tu Esclavo cuando lo invoques sin concentración.

El conjuro se otorga automáticamente a medida que subes de nivel.

Hex Damage.name: Daño de Maleficio
Hex Damage.condition: Cuando tu esclavo golpea a una criatura bajo el efecto de tu Maleficio

Cunning Action.name: Acción Astuta
Cunning Action.description: Tu agilidad mental y tu rapidez te permiten moverte y actuar con presteza. En tu turno, puedes llevar a cabo una de las siguientes acciones como acción adicional: &Reference[Correr], &Reference[Destrabarse] o &Reference[Esconderse].

Cunning Strike.name: Golpe Astuto
Cunning Strike.description:
Has desarrollado formas astutas de usar tu Ataque Furtivo. Cuando infliges daño de Ataque Furtivo, puedes añadir uno de los siguientes efectos de Golpe Astuto. Cada uno tiene un coste en dados que es la cantidad de dados de daño de Ataque Furtivo a los que debes renunciar para añadir el efecto. Retiras la cantidad de dados antes de tirar y el efecto se produce inmediatamente después de que se cause el daño del ataque. Por ejemplo, si añades el efecto de veneno, quita 1d6 del daño de Ataque Furtivo antes de tirar.

Si un efecto de Golpe Astuto requiere una tirada de salvación, la CD es igual a 8 más tu modificador de Destreza y bonificador de competencia.

Veneno (Coste: 1d6). Añades una toxina a tu golpe, forzando al objetivo a realizar una tirada de salvación de Constitución. Si falla la salvación, el objetivo tiene el estado de &Reference[Envenenado] durante 1 minuto. Al final de cada uno de sus turnos, el objetivo envenenado repite la salvación, terminando el efecto en sí mismo si tiene éxito.

Para usar este efecto, debes tener un kit de envenenador en tu persona.

Tropezar (Coste: 1d6). Si el objetivo es Grande o menor, debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Destreza o tener el estado de &Reference[Derribado].

Retirarse (Coste: 1d6). Inmediatamente después del ataque, te mueves hasta la mitad de tu velocidad sin provocar ataques de oportunidad.

Nota Foundry

Después de usar los efectos de Golpe Astuto, usa la actividad Ataque Furtivo Astuto en este rasgo. Te pedirá que selecciones cuántos dados gastaste en efectos y los deducirá de tu tirada de Ataque Furtivo automáticamente.

Puedes seleccionar el tipo de daño en el diálogo de tirada de daño.

La actividad Veneno incluye un Efecto Activo que aplica el estado de Envenenado.

La actividad Tropezar incluye un Efecto Activo que aplica el estado de Derribado o puedes usar la referencia en línea anterior.

Poison.name: Veneno
Poison.condition: Cuando infliges daño de Ataque Furtivo

Trip.name: Tropezar
Trip.condition: Cuando infliges daño de Ataque Furtivo

Cunning Sneak Attack.name: Ataque Furtivo Astuto
Cunning Sneak Attack.condition: Cuando infliges daño de Ataque Furtivo

Withdraw.name: Retirarse
Withdraw.condition: Cuando infliges daño de Ataque Furtivo

Cunning Strike: Poisoned.name: Golpe Astuto: Envenenado
Cunning Strike: Poisoned.description: Si falla la salvación, el objetivo tiene el estado de Envenenado durante 1 minuto.

Cutting Words.name: Palabras Cortantes
Cutting Words.description: Aprendes a usar tu astucia para distraer, confundir y minar la confianza y las aptitudes de los demás de manera sobrenatural. Cuando una criatura que puedas ver a 18m (60ft) o menos de ti haga una tirada de daño o tenga éxito en una prueba de característica o una tirada de ataque, puedes llevar a cabo una reacción para gastar un uso de tu Inspiración Bárdica; tira tu dado de Inspiración Bárdica y resta el número obtenido al resultado de la tirada de la criatura, lo que reducirá el daño o quizá convertirá el éxito en un fallo.

Cut with Words.name: Cortar con Palabras
Cut with Words.condition: Criatura que puedes ver a 18m o menos hace una tirada de daño o tiene éxito en una prueba de característica o tirada de ataque

Danger Sense.name: Sentir el Peligro
Danger Sense.description: Eres capaz de percibir de forma casi sobrenatural cuándo las cosas no son como deberían. Gracias a ello, se te da bien evitar el peligro. Tienes ventaja en las Tiradas de Dalvación de Destreza salvo que tengas el estado de &Reference[Incapacitated].

Danger Sense.name: Danger Sense
Danger Sense.description: You have Advantage on Dexterity saving throws unless you have the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition.

Dark One's Blessing.name: Bendición del Oscuro
Dark One's Blessing.description: Cuando reduzcas a 0 los puntos de golpe de un enemigo, obtienes una cantidad de puntos de golpe temporales igual a tu modificador por Carisma más tu nivel de brujo (mínimo de 1 punto de golpe temporal). También obtienes este beneficio si otra criatura reduce a 0 los puntos de golpe de un enemigo a 3 m o menos de ti.

heal.condition: Cuando reduzcas a 0 los puntos de golpe de un enemigo o un enemigo a 3 m o menos de ti sea reducido a 0 puntos de golpe

Dark One's Own Luck.name: La Suerte del Oscuro
Dark One's Own Luck.description:
Puedes invocar a tu patrón infernal para alterar el destino a tu favor. Cuando hagas una prueba de característica o una tirada de salvación, puedes utilizar este rasgo para sumar 1d10 a tu tirada. Puedes hacerlo después de ver el resultado de la tirada, pero antes de que ocurran sus efectos.

Puedes usar este rasgo una cantidad de veces igual a tu modificador por Carisma (mínimo una vez), pero no más de una vez por tirada. Recuperas todos los usos tras finalizar un descanso largo.

Luck.name: Luck
Luck.condition: When you make an ability check or saving throw

Dazzling Footwork.name: Juego de Pies Deslumbrante
Dazzling Footwork.description:
Mientras no lleves armadura ni portes un escudo, obtienes los siguientes beneficios.

Virtuoso de la danza. Tienes ventaja en cualquier prueba de Carisma (Interpretación) que hagas que implique bailar.

Defensa sin armadura. Tu clase de armadura base es igual a 10 más tus modificadores por Destreza y Carisma.

Ataques ágiles. Cuando gastes un uso de tu Inspiración bárdica como parte de una acción, una acción adicional o una reacción, puedes realizar un ataque sin armas como parte de esa acción, acción adicional o reacción.

Daño bárdico. Puedes usar tu Destreza en lugar de tu Fuerza para las tiradas de ataque de tus ataques sin armas. Cuando causas daño con un ataque sin armas, puedes infligir una cantidad de daño contundente igual al resultado de una tirada con tu dado de Inspiración bárdica más tu modificador por Destreza, en lugar del daño normal del ataque. No gastas el dado con esta tirada.

Death Strike.name: Golpe Mortal
Death Strike.description: Cuando aciertes con tu Ataque furtivo en el primer asalto de un combate, el objetivo deberá hacer una tirada de salvación de Constitución (CD 8 más tu modificador por Destreza y tu bonificador por competencia). Si no la supera, se duplicará el daño del ataque contra el objetivo.

Death Strike.name: Death Strike
Death Strike.condition: When you hit with your Sneak Attack on the first round of a combat

Defensive Tactics.name: Tácticas Defensivas
Defensive Tactics.description:
Obtienes una de las siguientes opciones de este rasgo, a tu elección. Tras finalizar un descanso corto o largo, puedes cambiar la opción elegida por la otra.

Defensa contra ataques múltiples. Cuando una criatura te acierte con una tirada de ataque, esa criatura tendrá desventaja en todas las demás tiradas de ataque contra ti este turno.

Escapar de la horda. Los ataques de oportunidad tienen desventaja contra ti.

Multiattack Defense.name: Multiattack Defense
Multiattack Defense.condition: When a creature hits you with an attack roll

Deflect Attacks.name: Desviar Ataques
Deflect Attacks.description:
When an attack roll hits you and its damage includes Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage, you can take a Reaction to reduce the attack's total damage against you. The reduction equals 1d10 plus your Dexterity modifier and Monk level.

If you reduce the damage to 0, you can expend 1 Focus Point to redirect some of the attack's force. If you do so, choose a creature you can see within 5 feet of yourself if the attack was a melee attack or a creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself that isn't behind Total Cover if the attack was a ranged attack. That creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take damage equal to two rolls of your Martial Arts die plus your Dexterity modifier. The damage is the same type dealt by the attack.

Foundry Note

The Reduce activity can be used to heal yourself to reduce the total damage if it's not enough to reduce it to 0.

The Redirect activity can be used to roll damage and consume a use of your Focus Points if you can reduce it to 0. You can select the type of damage in the roll dialog. The dice increase automatically as you level up.

Reduce.name: Reduce
Reduce.condition: When an attack roll hits you and its damage includes Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage

Redirect.name: Redirect
Redirect.condition: If you reduce the damage to 0

Deflect Energy.name: Desviar Energía
Deflect Energy.description:
You can now use your Deflect Attacks feature against attacks that deal any damage type, not just Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing.

The Reduce activity can be used to heal yourself to reduce the total damage if it's not enough to reduce it to 0.

The Redirect activity can be used to roll damage and consume a use of your Focus Points if you can reduce it to 0. You can select the type of damage in the roll dialog. The dice increase automatically as you level up.

Reduce.name: Reduce
Reduce.condition: When an attack roll hits you and its damage includes Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage

Redirect.name: Redirect
Redirect.condition: If you reduce the damage to 0

Deft Explorer.name: Explorador Diestro
Deft Explorer.description:
Thanks to your travels, you gain the following benefits.

Expertise. Choose one of your skill proficiencies with which you lack Expertise. You gain Expertise in that skill.

Languages. You know two languages of your choice from the language tables in chapter 2.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted for choices when you add the Ranger class to your character sheet.

Devil's Sight.name: Visión del Diablo
Devil's Sight.description:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You can see normally in Dim Light and Darkness—both magical and nonmagical—within 120 feet of yourself.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that grants you darkvision to 120 feet.

Devious Strikes.name: Golpes Traicioneros
Devious Strikes.description:
You’ve practiced new ways to use your Sneak Attack deviously. The following effects are now among your Cunning Strike options.

Daze (Cost: 2d6). The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw, or on its next turn, it can do only one of the following: move or take an action or a Bonus Action.

Knock Out (Cost: 6d6). The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw, or it has the &Reference[Unconscious] condition for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. The Unconscious target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Obscure (Cost: 3d6). The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw, or it has the &Reference[Blinded] condition until the end of its next turn.

Foundry Note

After using Cunning Strike effects use the [[/item Cunning Strike activity=Cunning Sneak Attack]]{Cunning Sneak Attack} activity. It will prompt you to select how many dice you expended on effects and deduct them from your Sneak Attack roll automatically.

You can control the damage type in the damage roll dialog box.

The Daze activity includes an Active Effect for tracking the dazed target but it does not automate the effect.

The Knock Out activity includes an Active Effect which applies the Unconscious condition.

The Obscure activity includes an Active Effect which applies the Blinded condition.

Daze.name: Daze
Daze.condition: When you deal Sneak Attack damage

Knock Out.name: Knock Out
Knock Out.condition: When you deal Sneak Attack damage

Obscure.name: Obscure
Obscure.condition: When you deal Sneak Attack damage

Devious Strikes: Dazed.name: Devious Strikes: Dazed
Devious Strikes: Dazed.description: On its next turn, the target can do only one of the following: move or take an action or a Bonus Action.

Devious Strikes: Knocked Out.name: Devious Strikes: Knocked Out
Devious Strikes: Knocked Out.description: The target has the Unconscious condition for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. The Unconscious target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Devious Strikes: Blinded.name: Devious Strikes: Blinded
Devious Strikes: Blinded.description: The target has the Blinded condition until the end of its next turn

Devouring Blade.name: Hoja Devoradora
Devouring Blade.description:
Prerequisite: Level 12+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvThirstingB]{Thirsting Blade} Invocation

The Extra Attack of your Thirsting Blade invocation confers two extra attacks rather than one.

Disarming Attack.name: Ataque Desarmante
Disarming Attack.description:
When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to disarm the target. Add the Superiority Die roll to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or drop one object of your choice that it's holding, with the object landing in its space.

Foundry Note

This feature will automatically use the higher of your Strength/Dexterity for the save.

The Damage included in the save allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog. It will remember your choice going forwards.

save.condition: When you hit a creature with an attack roll

Disciple of Life.name: Discípulo de la Vida
Disciple of Life.description:
When a spell you cast with a spell slot restores Hit Points to a creature, that creature regains additional Hit Points on the turn you cast the spell. The additional Hit Points equal 2 plus the spell slot's level.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a healing activity. Set the scale to the spell slot level you cast and it will provide a healing roll for you.

Disciplined Survivor.name: Superviviente Disciplinado
Disciplined Survivor.description:
Your physical and mental discipline grant you proficiency in all saving throws.

Additionally, whenever you make a saving throw and fail, you can expend 1 Focus Point to reroll it, and you must use the new roll.

Foundry Note

You will automatically be granted the additional Saving Throw proficiencies as you level up.

Use this feature to expend 1 Focus Point.

Distant Spell.name: Conjuro Distante
Distant Spell.description:
Coste: 1 punto de hechicería

Cuando lanzas un conjuro que tenga como mínimo un alcance de 1,5 m, puedes gastar 1 punto de hechicería para duplicar el alcance del conjuro. Como alternativa, cuando lanzas un conjuro que tenga un alcance de toque, puedes gastar 1 punto de hechicería para hacer que su alcance sea de 9 m.

Distant Spell.name: Distant Spell
Distant Spell.condition: When you cast a spell that has a range of at least 5 feet or when you cast a spell that has a range of Touch

Distracting Strike.name: Golpe Perturbador
Distracting Strike.description:
When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can expend one Superiority Die to distract the target. Add the Superiority Die roll to the attack's damage roll. The next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than you has Advantage if the attack is made before the start of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which can be used for tracking the distracted target but does not automate the Advantage.

The Damage activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog.

Divination Savant.name: Experto en Adivinación
Divination Savant.description:
Choose two Wizard spells from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Divination school} (change the Grouping mode to "School" for easier selection), each of which must be no higher than level 2, and add them to your spellbook for free.

In addition, whenever you gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class, you can add one Wizard spell from the Divination school to your spellbook for free. The chosen spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

Divine Fury.name: Furia Divina
Divine Fury.description:
You can channel divine power into your strikes. On each of your turns while your Rage is active, the first creature you hit with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike takes extra damage equal to 1d6 plus half your Barbarian level (round down). The extra damage is Necrotic or Radiant; you choose the type each time you deal the damage.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an activity for each type of damage.

Divine Intervention.name: Intervención Divina
Divine Intervention.description:
You can call on your deity or pantheon to intervene on your behalf. As a Magic action, choose any @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{Cleric spell} of level 5 or lower that doesn't require a Reaction to cast. As part of the same action, you cast that spell without expending a spell slot or needing Material components. You can't use this feature again until you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

Uncheck the "Consumption" box when casting the spell for the free use. This feature can be used to track available uses.

Divine Order.name: Orden Divino
Divine Order.description:
You have dedicated yourself to one of the following sacred roles of your choice.

Protector. Trained for battle, you gain proficiency with Martial weapons and training with Heavy armor.

Thaumaturge. You know one extra cantrip from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{Cleric spell list}. In addition, your mystical connection to the divine gives you a bonus to your Intelligence (Arcana or Religion) checks. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1).

Foundry Note

During advancement you will be able to choose which option you prefer.

Divine Order: Protector.name: Orden Divino: Protector
Divine Order: Protector.description:
You have dedicated yourself to the following sacred role:

Protector. Trained for battle, you gain proficiency with Martial weapons and training with Heavy armor.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which grants the proficiency and training.

Divine Order: Thaumaturge.name: Orden Divino: Taumaturgo
Divine Order: Thaumaturge.description:
You have dedicated yourself to the following sacred role:

Thaumaturge. You know one extra cantrip from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{Cleric spell list}. In addition, your mystical connection to the divine gives you a bonus to your Intelligence (Arcana or Religion) checks. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1, currently [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]]).

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which increases the number of cantrips you can know and grants the bonus to your Intelligence (Arcana or Religion) checks.

Diviner.name: Adivinador
Diviner.description:
Learn the Secrets of the Multiverse

The counsel of a Diviner is sought by those who want a clearer understanding of the past, present, and future. As a Diviner, you strive to part the veils of space, time, and consciousness. You work to master spells of discernment, remote viewing, supernatural knowledge, and foresight.

Draconic Resilience.name: Resistencia Dracónica
Draconic Resilience.description:
The magic in your body manifests physical traits of your draconic gift. Your Hit Point maximum increases by 3, and it increases by 1 whenever you gain another Sorcerer level.

Parts of you are also covered by dragon-like scales. While you aren’t wearing armor, your base Armor Class equals 10 plus your Dexterity and Charisma modifiers.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that automatically increases your Hit Point maximum and sets up your Unarmored Defense which can be disabled if you would prefer to use armor.

Draconic Sorcery.name: Hechicería Dracónica
Draconic Sorcery.description:
El poder dracónico hierve en tus venas

Tu magia innata proviene de la magia dracónica que se mezcló con tu sangre o la de tus ancestros. Algunos hechiceros dracónicos pueden rastrear su linaje hasta un poderoso dragón.

Draconic Spells.title: Conjuros Dracónicos
Draconic Spells.hint: Cuando alcanzas un nivel de hechicero especificado en la tabla de Conjuros Dracónicos, a partir de entonces siempre tendrás preparados los conjuros indicados.

8UnvG3X4TR3MpCGe.hint:
Tu magia dracónica tiene afinidad con un tipo de daño asociado a los dragones. Elige uno de estos tipos: Ácido, Frío, Fuego, Relámpago o Veneno.
                
                Tienes resistencia a ese tipo de daño.

Draconic Spells.name: Conjuros Dracónicos
Draconic Spells.description:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Draconic Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Draconic Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAlterSelf0]{Alter Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplChromaticO]{Chromatic Orb}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDragonsBre]{Dragon’s Breath}
5@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFear000000]{Fear}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}
7@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplArcaneEye0]{Arcane Eye}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmMonst]{Charm Monster}
9@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLegendLore]{Legend Lore}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonDrag]{Summon Dragon}

Foundry Note

The spells will be automatically granted as you level up.

Dragon Companion.name: Compañero Dragón
Dragon Companion.description:
You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonDrag]{Summon Dragon} without a Material component. You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a Long Rest.

Whenever you start casting the spell, you can modify it so that it doesn’t require Concentration. If you do so, the spell’s duration becomes 1 minute for that casting.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for tracking your free usage. When you cast the spell you can uncheck the "Consumption" box and, optionally, the "Concentration" box.

Dragon Wings.name: Alas de Dragón
Dragon Wings.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can cause draconic wings to appear on your back. The wings last for 1 hour or until you dismiss them (no action required). For the duration, you have a Fly Speed of 60 feet.

Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest unless you spend 3 Sorcery Points (no action required) to restore your use of it.

Foundry Note

The Dragon Wings activity includes an Active Effect that grants you a Fly Speed of 60 feet.

The Restore Use activity can be used to expend the Sorcery Points to restore a use of the Dragon Wings activity.

Winged.name: Winged
Winged.description: he wings last for 1 hour or until you dismiss them (no action required). For the duration, you have a Fly Speed of 60 feet.

Dread Ambusher.name: Emboscador Terrible
Dread Ambusher.description:
You have mastered the art of creating fearsome ambushes, granting you the following benefits.

Ambusher’s Leap. At the start of your first turn of each combat, your Speed increases by 10 feet until the end of that turn.

Dreadful Strike. When you attack a creature and hit it with a weapon, you can deal an extra 2d6 Psychic damage. You can use this benefit only once per turn, you can use it a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Initiative Bonus. When you roll Initiative, you can add your Wisdom modifier to the roll.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automatically adds your Wisdom modifier to your Initiative roll.

The Dreadful Strike activity includes the additional damage and tracks your limited number of uses. It's damage will automatically increase when you gain the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrStalkersFl]{Stalker's Flurry} feature.

The Ambusher's Leap activity includes an Active Effect that can be used to increase your Speed by 10 feet.

Dreadful Strike.name: Dreadful Strike
Dreadful Strike.condition: When you attack and hit a creature with a weapon

Ambusher's Leap.name: Ambusher's Leap
Ambusher's Leap.condition: At the start of your first turn of each combat

Dreadful Strikes.name: Golpes Terribles
Dreadful Strikes.description:
You can augment your weapon strikes with mind-scarring magic drawn from the murky hollows of the Feywild. When you hit a creature with a weapon, you can deal an extra 1d4 Psychic damage to the target, which can take this extra damage only once per turn. The extra damage increases to 1d6 when you reach Ranger level 11.

Foundry Note

The Damage activity includes the extra damage. It automatically scales as you level up.

damage.condition: When you hit a creature with a weapon

Druid.name: Druida
Druid.description:
Un Sacerdote de la Antigua Fe de la Naturaleza

Atributos Básicos de Druida

Característica Principal

Sabiduría

Dado de Puntos de Golpe

D8 por nivel de druida

Competencias en Tiradas de Salvación

Inteligencia y Sabiduría

Competencias en Habilidades

Elige 2: Arcana, Medicina, Naturaleza, Percepción, Religión o Supervivencia

Competencias con Armas

Armas sencillas

Competencias con Herramientas

Kit de herbolario

Entrenamiento con Armaduras

Armaduras ligeras y escudos

Equipo Inicial

Elige A o B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Armadura de cuero}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]{Bastón}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtlsHerbalism]{Kit de herbolario}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagExplorersPa]{Paquete de explorador}, Símbolo Druídico (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtlsWooden00]{Tótem de madera}), y [[/award 9gp]]; o (B) [[/award 50GP]]

Los druidas pertenecen a órdenes antiguas que invocan las fuerzas primigenias de la naturaleza. Aprovechando la magia de los animales, las plantas y los cuatro elementos, e incluso invocando criaturas de esas fuerzas, los druidas la combinan con varios grados de práctica marcial para defenderse a sí mismos y a sus aliados.

Algunos druidas son sucesores de tradiciones chamánicas que nunca se olvidaron del multiverso; las conservan en comunidades que subsisten del mundo natural. Otros reforzaron la conexión rota entre su pueblo y la naturaleza. Otros se han entrenado en tradiciones vivas que se remontan a las primeras civilizaciones. Y otros tienen poderes de linajes de hadas o en el choque de fuerzas arcanas que permeó el mundo con el nacimiento de la magia: algunas de estas personas se convirtieron en druidas para vigilar y proteger a su pueblo de fuerzas salvajes, mientras que otras fueron enviadas en busca de aventuras como campeones de la naturaleza.

Convertirse en Druida …

Como Personaje de Nivel 1

  • Obtienes todos los atributos de la tabla \"Atributos básicos de druida\".
  • Obtienes los rasgos de nivel 1 de druida, que se muestran en la tabla \"Rasgos de druida\".

Como Personaje Multiclase

  • Obtienes los siguientes atributos de la tabla \"Atributos básicos de druida\": dado de puntos de golpe y entrenamiento con armaduras ligeras.
  • Obtienes los rasgos de nivel 1 de druida, que se muestran en la tabla \"Rasgos de druida\".
  • Consulta las normas de multiclase del capítulo 2 para determinar tus espacios de conjuro disponibles.

Primal Order.title: Orden Primigenio
Primal Order.hint: You have dedicated yourself to one of the following sacred roles of your choice.

Elemental Fury.title: Furia Elemental
Elemental Fury.hint: The might of the elements flows through you. You gain one of the following options of your choice.

Druidic.title: Druídico
Druidic.hint: You know Druidic, the secret language of Druids.

Druidic.name: Druídico
Druidic.description: Sabes druídico, el idioma secreto de los druidas. Mientras aprendías esta lengua antigua, accediste a la magia para ocultar mensajes de personas que no sean druidas. Puedes hablar el idioma y usarlo para dejar mensajes ocultos. Quienes conozcan esta lengua detectarán automáticamente tales mensajes. Otros advertirán la presencia del mensaje si tienen éxito en una prueba de Sabiduría (Percepción) CD 15, pero sin la ayuda de magia no podrán descifrarlo.

Elder Champion.name: Campeón Anciano
Elder Champion.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can imbue your Aura of Protection with primal power, granting the benefits below for 1 minute or until you end them (no action required). Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also restore your use of it by expending a level 5 spell slot (no action required).

Diminish Defiance. Enemies in the aura have Disadvantage on saving throws against your spells and Channel Divinity options.

Regeneration. At the start of each of your turns, you regain 10 Hit Points.

Swift Spells. Whenever you cast a spell that has a casting time of an action, you can cast it using a Bonus Action instead.

Foundry Note

The Elder Champion activity will consume a use and includes an Active Effect which can be used for tracking creatures impacted by Diminished Defense.

The Regeneration activity includes the 10 Hit Points you can regain each turn.

The Restore Use activity will consume a 5th level spell slot and restore a use of this feature.

Eldritch Hex.name: Maleficio Sobrenatural
Eldritch Hex.description:
Your alien patron grants you a powerful curse. You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHex0000000]{Hex} spell prepared. When you cast Hex and choose an ability, the target also has Disadvantage on saving throws of the chosen ability for the duration of the spell.

Foundry Note

The spell is automatically added to your sheet when you level up.

Eldritch Invocations.name: Invocaciones Sobrenaturales
Eldritch Invocations.description:
You have unearthed Eldritch Invocations, pieces of forbidden knowledge that imbue you with an abiding magical ability or other lessons. You gain one invocation of your choice, such as @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactTome00]{Pact of the Tome}. Invocations are described in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbWarlock000000.JournalEntryPage.FA4hxx49eazhISIt]{Eldritch Invocation Options} section.

Prerequisites. If an invocation has a prerequisite, you must meet it to learn that invocation. For example, if an invocation requires you to be a level 5+ Warlock, you can select the invocation once you reach Warlock level 5.

Replacing and Gaining Invocations. Whenever you gain a Warlock level, you can replace one of your invocations with another one for which you qualify. You can’t replace an invocation if it’s a prerequisite for another invocation that you have.

When you gain certain Warlock levels, you gain more invocations of your choice, as shown in the Invocations column of the Warlock Features table.

Current Max Eldritch Invocations: [[lookup @scale.warlock.invocations-known]]

You can’t pick the same invocation more than once unless its description says otherwise.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted for your choices as you level up. The advancement system does not prevent you from taking any invocations so be sure that you meet the requirements before selecting one.

Eldritch Knight.name: Caballero Arcano
Eldritch Knight.description:
Combina arma y conjuro

Los caballeros arcanos combinan la destreza marcial con el poder de la magia. Sus conjuros complementan y amplían sus habilidades de combate. Su magia se centra en dos escuelas de magia de mago que son particularmente útiles en batalla: Abjuración y Evocación.

Eldritch Master.name: Maestro Sobrenatural
Eldritch Master.description:
When you use your Magical Cunning feature, you regain all your expended Pact Magic spell slots.

Foundry Note

Use this feature to restore all expended Pact Magic spell slots. It will consume the free use from your Magical Cunning feature.

Eldritch Mind.name: Mente Sobrenatural
Eldritch Mind.description: You have Advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain Concentration.

Eldritch Smite.name: Castigo Sobrenatural
Eldritch Smite.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactBlade0]{Pact of the Blade} Invocation

Once per turn when you hit a creature with your pact weapon, you can expend a Pact Magic spell slot to deal an extra 1d8 Force damage to the target, plus another 1d8 per level of the spell slot, and you can give the target the &Reference[Prone] condition if it is Huge or smaller.

Foundry Note

The Smite activity consumes a Pact Magic spell slot and increases the damage based on your pact spell level.

Smite.name: Smite
Smite.condition: Hit a creature with your pact weapon

Eldritch Spear.name: Lanza Sobrenatural
Eldritch Spear.description:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock, a Warlock Cantrip That Deals Damage

Choose one of your known Warlock cantrips that deals damage and has a range of 10+ feet. When you cast that spell, its range increases by a number of feet equal to 30 times your Warlock level.

Repeatable. You can gain this invocation more than once. Each time you do so, choose a different eligible cantrip.

Foundry Note

Use the Increase Range enchantment activity and drag your chosen cantrip to the chat card to increase its range and append ", Eldritch Spear" for easier identification.

Eldritch Strike.name: Golpe Sobrenatural
Eldritch Strike.description:
You learn how to make your weapon strikes undercut a creature's ability to withstand your spells. When you hit a creature with an attack using a weapon, that creature has Disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes against a spell you cast before the end of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which can be used for tracking but does not automate the Disadvantage.

Elemental Affinity.name: Afinidad Elemental
Elemental Affinity.description:
Your draconic magic has an affinity with a damage type associated with dragons. Choose one of those types: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison.

You have Resistance to that damage type, and when you cast a spell that deals damage of that type, you can add your Charisma modifier to one damage roll of that spell.

Foundry Note

You will be prompted to choose the damage type as you level up. The additional damage is not automatically added but this feature includes an activity for each type of damage.

You can speed up use of this feature by moving your chosen damage type to the top and it will be used automatically when using this feature.

Acid.name: Acid
Acid.condition: When you cast a spell that deals damage of your elemental affinity

Cold.name: Cold
Cold.condition: When you cast a spell that deals damage of your elemental affinity

Fire.name: Fire
Fire.condition: When you cast a spell that deals damage of your elemental affinity

Lightning.name: Lightning
Lightning.condition: When you cast a spell that deals damage of your elemental affinity

Poison.name: Poison
Poison.condition: When you cast a spell that deals damage of your elemental affinity

Elemental Attunement.name: Sintonía Elemental
Elemental Attunement.description:
At the start of your turn, you can expend 1 Focus Point to imbue yourself with elemental energy. The energy lasts for 10 minutes or until you have the Incapacitated condition. You gain the following benefits while this feature is active.

Reach. When you make an Unarmed Strike, your reach is 10 feet greater than normal, as elemental energy extends from you.

Elemental Strikes. Whenever you hit with your Unarmed Strike, you can cause it to deal your choice of Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage rather than its normal damage type. When you deal one of these types with it, you can also force the target to make a [[/save]]{Strength saving throw.} On a failed save, you can move the target up to 10 feet toward or away from you, as elemental energy swirls around it.

Foundry Note

The Activate Attunement activity expends 1 Focus Point and self-enchants to provide the two activities mentioned below. Additionally, when activated, this activity will be renamed to "End Attunement" with no Focus Point cost and can be used to remove the attunement benefits once the duration ends.

The Elemental Strike activity can be used for your Unarmed Strike and will allow you to select the damage type in the roll dialog.

The Elemental Save activity includes the Strength saving throw.

Elemental Save.name: Elemental Save
Elemental Save.condition: When you deal Elemental Strike damage

Elemental Burst.name: Estallido Elemental
Elemental Burst.description:
As a Magic action, you can expend 2 Focus Points to cause elemental energy to burst in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of yourself. Choose a damage type: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

Each creature in the Sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes damage of the chosen type equal to three rolls of your Martial Arts die. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

Foundry Note

The damage type can be selected in the roll dialog.

Elemental Epitome.name: Epítome Elemental
Elemental Epitome.description:
While your Elemental Attunement is active, you also gain the following benefits.

Damage Resistance. You gain Resistance to one of the following damage types of your choice: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. At the start of each of your turns, you can change this choice.

Destructive Stride. When you use your Step of the Wind, your Speed increases by 20 feet until the end of the turn. For that duration, any creature of your choice takes damage equal to one roll of your Martial Arts die when you enter a space within 5 feet of it. The damage type is your choice of Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Empowered Strikes. Once on each of your turns, you can deal extra damage to a target equal to one roll of your Martial Arts die when you hit it with an Unarmed Strike. The extra damage is the same type dealt by that strike.

Foundry Note

This Damage Resistance activity includes 5 Active Effects which you can toggle between to select your preferred Resistance.

The Destructive Stride activity includes an Active Effect which can increase your Movement Speed by 20 feet and allows you to choose the type of damage in the roll dialog.

The Empowered Strike activity allows you to choose the damage type in the roll dialog.

Destructive Stride.name: Destructive Stride
Destructive Stride.condition: When you use your Step of the Wind

Empowered Strike.name: Empowered Strike
Empowered Strike.condition: Once on each of your turns when you hit with an Unarmed Strike

Damage Resistance.name: Damage Resistance
Damage Resistance.condition: While your Elemental Attunement is active

Elemental Fury.name: Furia Elemental
Elemental Fury.description:
The might of the elements flows through you. You gain one of the following options of your choice.

Potent Spellcasting. Add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any Druid cantrip.

Primal Strike. Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or a Beast form's attack in Wild Shape, you can cause the target to take an extra 1d8 [[/damage 1d8 type=cold]]{cold}, [[/damage 1d8 type=fire]]{fire}, [[/damage 1d8 type=lightning]]{lightning}, or [[/damage 1d8 type=thunder]]{thunder} damage (choose when you hit).

Foundry Note

You will be prompted to choose during advancement.

Elemental Fury: Potent Spellcasting.name: Furia Elemental: Lanzamiento de Conjuros Potente
Elemental Fury: Potent Spellcasting.description:
Add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any Druid cantrip (currently, [[lookup @abilities.wis.mod]]).

Foundry Note

This feature does not automate the addition of the Wisdom modifier to Druid cantrips.

Elemental Fury: Primal Strike.name: Furia Elemental: Golpe Primigenio
Elemental Fury: Primal Strike.description:
Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or a Beast form's attack in Wild Shape, you can cause the target to take an extra 1d8 [[/damage 1d8 type=cold]]{cold}, [[/damage 1d8 type=fire]]{fire}, [[/damage 1d8 type=lightning]]{lightning}, or [[/damage 1d8 type=thunder]]{thunder} damage (choose when you hit).

Foundry Note

This feature's damage will automatically increase when you gain @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbdrdImprovedEl]{Improved Elemental Fury}. If using the activity you will be able to select the damage type when rolling. It will default to your previously chosen damage type.

Elusive.name: Escurridizo
Elusive.description: Eres tan escurridizo que será raro que un atacante consiga ventaja cuando ataque. Ninguna tirada de ataque contra ti tendrá ventaja a menos que tengas el estado de incapacitado.

Empowered Evocation.name: Evocación Potenciada
Empowered Evocation.description:
Whenever you cast a Wizard spell from the Evocation school, you can add your Intelligence modifier to one damage roll of that spell.

Foundry Note

You can add your Intelligence modifier to the spell's Situational Bonus in the damage dialog or use this feature's Damage activity which allows you to select the type in the damage dialog.

damage.condition: Whenever you cast a Wizard spell from the Evocation school

Empowered Spell.name: Conjuro Potenciado
Empowered Spell.description:
Coste: 1 punto de hechicería

Cuando tiras el daño de un conjuro, puedes gastar 1 punto de hechicería para repetir la tirada de, como mucho, tantos dados de daño como tu modificador por Carisma (mínimo de un dado) y deberás usar los nuevos resultados.

Puedes usar Conjuro potenciado aunque ya hayas empleado una opción diferente de metamagia durante el lanzamiento del conjuro.

Empowered Spell.name: Empowered Spell
Empowered Spell.condition: When you roll damage for a spell

Empowered Strikes.name: Golpes Potenciados
Empowered Strikes.description:
Whenever you deal damage with your Unarmed Strike, it can deal your choice of Force damage or its normal damage type.

Foundry Note

The Empowered Strike activity on this feature can allows you to choose between Force and Bludgeoning damage in the roll dialog. It will remember your choice going forward.

It uses your Martial Arts Die (currently [[lookup @scale.monk.die]] for damage and will automatically update as you level up.

Envenom Weapons.name: Envenenar Armas
Envenom Weapons.description:
When you use the [[/item Cunning Strike activity="Poison"]]{Poison} option of your Cunning Strike, the target also takes [[/damage 2d6 poison]] damage whenever it fails the saving throw. This damage ignores Resistance to Poison damage.

Foundry Note

The Poison activity on this feature includes the save and poison damage.

Alternatively, you can use the inline roll above if you've already used the original activity.

Important: This damage does not automatically bypass resistances so ensure the correct damage is being applied.

Poison.name: Poison
Poison.condition: When you deal Sneak Attack damage

Epic Boon.name: Don Épico
Epic Boon.description: Obtienes una @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.GxfrwkJbrIvn7reC]{Dote de Don Épico} (consulta el capítulo 5) u otra dote de tu elección para la que cumplas las condiciones.

Evasion.name: Evasión
Evasion.description: Cuando sufras un efecto que te permita hacer una tirada de salvación de Destreza para sufrir solo la mitad de daño, no recibes daño alguno si la superas y solo sufres la mitad de daño si la fallas.

Evasive Footwork.name: Juego de Pies Evasivo
Evasive Footwork.description: As a Bonus Action, you can expend one Superiority Die and take the Disengage action. You also roll the die and add the number rolled to your AC until the start of your next turn.

Evasive AC.name: Evasive AC
Evasive AC.description: Your AC is increased by one roll of your Superiority Die until the start of your next turn.

Evocation Savant.name: Experto en Evocación
Evocation Savant.description:
Choose two Wizard spells from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Evocation school} (change the Grouping mode to "School" for easier selection), each of which must be no higher than level 2, and add them to your spellbook for free.

In addition, whenever you gain access to a new level of spell slots in this class, you can add one Wizard spell from the Evocation school to your spellbook for free. The chosen spell must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

Evoker.name: Evocador
Evoker.description:
Create Explosive Elemental Effects

Your studies focus on magic that creates powerful elemental effects such as bitter cold, searing flame, rolling thunder, crackling lightning, and burning acid. Some Evokers find employment in military forces, serving as artillery to blast armies from afar. Others use their power to protect others, while some seek their own gain.

Exceptional Training.name: Entrenamiento Excepcional
Exceptional Training.description:
When you take a Bonus Action to command your Primal Companion beast to take an action, you can also command it to take the &Reference[Dash], &Reference[Disengage], &Reference[Dodge], or &Reference[Help] action using its Bonus Action.

In addition, whenever it hits with an attack roll and deals damage, it can deal your choice of Force damage or its normal damage type.

Foundry Note

The Train Companion enchantment activity is designed to be applied to your Companion's "Beast's Strike" item and adds the option of Force damage to that Action's damage roll configuration.

Train Companion.name: Train Companion
Train Companion.condition: As needed to add Force damage option

Exceptionally Trained.name: Exceptionally Trained
Exceptionally Trained.description: Whenever the Companion hits with an attack roll and deals damage, it can deal your choice of Force damage or its normal damage type.

Expert Divination.name: Adivinación Experta
Expert Divination.description:
Casting Divination spells comes so easily to you that it expends only a fraction of your spellcasting efforts. When you cast a Divination spell using a level 2+ spell slot, you regain one expended spell slot. The slot you regain must be of a level lower than the slot you expended and can’t be higher than level 5.

Foundry Note

You can manually regain the expended spell slot or use the Regain Spell Slot activity which will prompt you for the slot to restore.

Expertise.name: Pericia
Expertise.description:
Ganas pericia (consulta el glosario de reglas) en dos de tus competencias en habilidades de tu elección.

En el nivel 9 ganas pericia en otras dos competencias de tu elección.

Extended Spell.name: Conjuro Extendido
Extended Spell.description:
Coste: 1 punto de hechicería

Cuando lanzas un conjuro que tenga una duración de al menos 1 minuto, puedes gastar 1 punto de hechicería para duplicar su duración, hasta un máximo de 24 horas.

Si el conjuro afectado requiere concentración, tienes ventaja en cualquier tirada de salvación que hagas para mantener la concentración.

Extended Spell.name: Extended Spell
Extended Spell.condition: When you cast a spell that has a duration of 1 minute or longer

Extra Attack.name: Ataque Adicional
Extra Attack.description: Cuando lleves a cabo la acción de atacar en tu turno, podrás hacer dos ataques en lugar de uno.

Faithful Steed.name: Corcel Fiel
Faithful Steed.description:
You can call on the aid of an otherworldly steed. You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindSteed0]{Find Steed} spell prepared.

You can also cast the spell once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Find Steed spell is added to your spell list as always prepared and with a free use per Long Rest when you reach this level.

Fanatical Focus.name: Concentración Fanática
Fanatical Focus.description: Once per active Rage, if you fail a saving throw, you can reroll it with a bonus equal to your Rage Damage bonus (currently [[/r @scale.barbarian.rage-damage]]), and you must use the new roll.

Fast Hands.name: Manos Rápidas
Fast Hands.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can do one of the following.

Sleight of Hand. Make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check to pick a lock or disarm a trap with Thieves’ Tools or to pick a pocket.

Use an Object. Take the Utilize action, or take the Magic action to use a magic item that requires that action.

Foundry Note

The Sleight of Hand and Thieves' Tools activities include the relevant checks.

The Use an Object activity can be used for tracking Bonus Action use.

Fast Movement.name: Movimiento Rápido
Fast Movement.description:
Tu velocidad aumenta en 10ft (3m) si no llevas armadura pesada.

Nota Foundry

Este Rasgo incluye un Efecto Activo que automaticamente aumenta la Velocidad de Movimiento. Recuerda desactivar el rasgo si llevas Armadura Pesada.

Favored Enemy.name: Enemigo Predilecto
Favored Enemy.description:
You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHuntersMar]{Hunter’s Mark} spell prepared. You can cast it twice without expending a spell slot, and you regain all expended uses of this ability when you finish a Long Rest.

The number of times you can cast the spell without a spell slot increases when you reach certain Ranger levels, as shown in the Favored Enemy column of the Ranger Features table.

Foundry Note

The spell is granted to you at this level and will increase the number of free uses available automatically as you level up.

Feinting Attack.name: Ataque con Finta
Feinting Attack.description:
As a Bonus Action, you can expend one Superiority Die to feint, choosing one creature within 5 feet of yourself as your target. You have Advantage on your next attack roll against that target this turn. If that attack hits, add the Superiority Die to the attack's damage roll.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for tracking the target but it does not automate the Advantage.

The Damage activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog.

Feral Instinct.name: Instinto Salvaje
Feral Instinct.description: Tus instintos están tan afinados que tienes ventaja en las tiradas de iniciativa.

Feral Senses.name: Sentidos Salvajes
Feral Senses.description:
Your connection to the forces of nature grants you Blindsight with a range of 30 feet.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which upgrades your Blindsight to 30 feet if you do not already have it.

Fey Reinforcements.name: Refuerzos Feéricos
Fey Reinforcements.description:
You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSummonFey0]{Summon Fey} without a Material component. You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a Long Rest.

Whenever you start casting the spell, you can modify it so that it doesn’t require Concentration. If you do so, the spell’s duration becomes 1 minute for that casting.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for tracking the free use. Then cast the spell and uncheck the "Consumption" box and optionally the "Concentration" option.

Fey Wanderer.name: Errante Feérico
Fey Wanderer.description:
Wield Fey Mirth and Fury

A fey mystique surrounds you, thanks to the boon of an archfey or a location in the Feywild that transformed you. However you gained fey magic, you are now a Fey Wanderer. Your joyful laughter brightens the hearts of the downtrodden, and your martial prowess strikes terror in your foes, for great is the mirth of the fey and dreadful is their fury.

Fey Wanderer Spells.name: Conjuros de Errante Feérico
Fey Wanderer Spells.description:
When you reach a Ranger level specified in the Fey Wanderer Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Fey Wanderer Spells

Foundry Note

The spells will be automatically granted as you level up.

Fiend Patron.name: Patrón Infernal
Fiend Patron.description:
Extrae poder de un señor infernal

Tu pacto te vincula a un señor infernal, un ser cuya ambición y sed de poder no conoce límites. Tales seres incluyen demonios, diablos y otros seres de los Planos Inferiores.

Fiend Spells.title: Conjuros Infernales
Fiend Spells.hint: The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Fiend Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Fiend Spells.name: Conjuros Infernales
Fiend Spells.description:

Foundry Note

As you level up these spells will be granted to you automatically.

Fiendish Resilience.name: Resistencia Infernal
Fiendish Resilience.description:
Choose one damage type, other than Force, whenever you finish a Short or Long Rest. You have Resistance to that damage type until you choose a different one with this feature.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for each type of damage which will grant you the correct Resistance. Apply and disable the effects as necessary when you change types.

Fiendish Vigor.name: Vigor Infernal
Fiendish Vigor.description:
Prerequisite: Level 2+ Warlock

You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFalseLife0]{False Life} on yourself without expending a spell slot. When you cast the spell with this feature, you don’t roll the die for the Temporary Hit Points; you automatically get the highest number on the die.

Foundry Note

The False Life activity includes the maximum amount of healing.

Fighter.name: Guerrero
Fighter.description:
Un Maestro de las Armas con Técnicas Marciales

Atributos Básicos de Guerrero

Característica Principal

Fuerza o Destreza

Dado de Puntos de Golpe

D10 por nivel de guerrero

Competencias en Tiradas de Salvación

Fuerza y Constitución

Competencias en Habilidades

Elige 2: Acrobacias, Atletismo, Historia, Intimidación, Percepción, Perspicacia, Supervivencia o Trato con animales

Competencias con Armas

Armas sencillas y marciales

Entrenamiento con Armaduras

Todas las armaduras y escudos

Equipo Inicial

Elige A o B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmChainmail0]{Cota de mallas}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Mandoble}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepFlail00000]{Mangual}, 8 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepJavelin000]{Jabalinas}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagAdventurerP]{Paquete de aventurero}, y [[/award 4gp]]; o (B) [[/award 155GP]]

Los guerreros dominan el arte de la batalla. Se entrenan sin descanso con diversas armas y armaduras para proteger a sus aliados y derrotar a sus enemigos. El desafío de la batalla llena a los guerreros de un propósito, y la mejor de las victorias es la que resuelve un conflicto y preserva la paz.

Los guerreros aprenden lo básico de todos los estilos de combate y pueden manejar armas con maestría suprema. Un guerrero bien equipado es la base de cualquier fuerza de combate. Los guerreros son los maestros tácticos del campo de batalla, sin parangón con espada, hacha, o arco.

Convertirse en Guerrero …

Como Personaje de Nivel 1

  • Obtienes todos los atributos de la tabla "Atributos básicos de guerrero".
  • Obtienes los rasgos de nivel 1 de guerrero, que se muestran en la tabla "Rasgos de guerrero".

Como Personaje Multiclase

  • Obtienes los siguientes atributos de la tabla "Atributos básicos de guerrero": dado de puntos de golpe y competencia con armas marciales, y entrenamiento con todas las armaduras y escudos.
  • Obtienes los rasgos de nivel 1 de guerrero, que se muestran en la tabla "Rasgos de guerrero".

Fighting Style.name: Estilo de Combate
Fighting Style.description:
You have honed your martial prowess and gain a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbFeats00000000.JournalEntryPage.sbHImaCB8ZMEHYkb]{Fighting Style feat} of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbfstDefense000]{Defense} is recommended.

Whenever you gain a Fighter level, you can replace the feat you chose with a different Fighting Style feat.

Fleet Step.name: Paso Veloz
Fleet Step.description: When you take a Bonus Action other than Step of the Wind, you can also use Step of the Wind immediately after that Bonus Action.

Flurry of Healing and Harm.name: Ráfaga de Curación y Daño
Flurry of Healing and Harm.description:
When you use Flurry of Blows, you can replace each of the Unarmed Strikes with a use of Hand of Healing without expending Focus Points for the healing.

In addition, when you make an Unarmed Strike with Flurry of Blows and deal damage, you can use Hand of Harm with that strike without expending a Focus Point for Hand of Harm. You can still use Hand of Harm only once per turn.

You can use these benefits a total number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once). You regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature can be used for tracking your available uses.

Foe Slayer.name: Mataenemigos
Foe Slayer.description:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHuntersMar]{Hunter’s Mark} is a d10 rather than a d6.

Foundry Note

You may use this feature in place of the Bonus Mark Damage activity on the Hunter's Mark spell.

Font of Inspiration.name: Fuente de Inspiración
Font of Inspiration.description:
You now regain all your expended uses of Bardic Inspiration when you finish a Short or Long Rest.

In addition, you can expend a spell slot (no action required) to regain one expended use of Bardic Inspiration.

Foundry Note

You must update the Bardic Inspiration feature on your sheet to refresh on Short Rest as it defaults to Long rest.

The Recharge with Spell Slot activity will expend a spell slot and grant another use of Bardic Inspiration.

Font of Magic.name: Fuente de Magia
Font of Magic.description:
You can tap into the wellspring of magic within yourself. This wellspring is represented by Sorcery Points, which allow you to create a variety of magical effects.

You have 2 Sorcery Points, and you gain more as you reach higher levels, as shown in the Sorcery Points column of the Sorcerer Features table. You can’t have more Sorcery Points than the number shown in the table for your level. You regain all expended Sorcery Points when you finish a Long Rest.

You can use your Sorcery Points to fuel the options below, along with other features, such as Metamagic, that use those points.

Converting Spell Slots to Sorcery Points. You can expend a spell slot to gain a number of Sorcery Points equal to the slot’s level (no action required).

Creating Spell Slots. As a Bonus Action, you can transform unexpended Sorcery Points into one spell slot. The Creating Spell Slots table shows the cost of creating a spell slot of a given level, and it lists the minimum Sorcerer level you must be to create a slot. You can create a spell slot no higher than level 5.

Any spell slot you create with this feature vanishes when you finish a Long Rest.

Creating Spell Slots

122

579

Foundry Note

The Regain Spell Slot activity will convert your Sorcery Points into spell slots.

The Regain Sorcery Points activity will convert your chosen spell slot into Sorcery Points.

Frenzy.name: Frenesí
Frenzy.description:
If you use Reckless Attack while your Rage is active, you deal extra damage to the first target you hit on your turn with a Strength-based attack. To determine the extra damage, roll a number of d6s equal to your Rage Damage bonus, and add them together. The damage has the same type as the weapon or Unarmed Strike used for the attack.

Foundry Note

The Damage activity scales automatically as you level up and allows you to select the type of damage to use in the damage roll's dialog box. It will then remember your choice going forward.

Full of Stars.name: Lleno de Estrellas
Full of Stars.description:
While in your Starry Form, you become partially incorporeal, giving you Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automates the addition of the Resistances. It is not automatically applied when entering your Starry Form though. It can be activated by using this feature and applying it or by turning the Active Effect on in your character sheet's Effects tab.

Gaze of Two Minds.name: Mirada de Dos Mentes
Gaze of Two Minds.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

You can use a Bonus Action to touch a willing creature and perceive through its senses until the end of your next turn. As long as the creature is on the same plane of existence as you, you can take a Bonus Action on subsequent turns to maintain this connection, extending the duration until the end of your next turn. The connection ends if you don’t maintain it in this way.

While perceiving through the other creature’s senses, you benefit from any special senses possessed by that creature, and you can cast spells as if you were in your space or the other creature’s space if the two of you are within 60 feet of each other.

Gift of the Depths.name: Don de las Profundidades
Gift of the Depths.description:
Prerequisite: Level 5+ Warlock

You can breathe underwater, and you gain a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

You can also cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWaterBreat]{Water Breathing} once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast it in this way again when you finish a Long Rest.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWaterBreat inline]

Water Breathing & Swim Speed.name: Water Breathing & Swim Speed
Water Breathing & Swim Speed.description: You can breathe underwater, and you gain a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Gift of the Protectors.name: Don de los Protectores
Gift of the Protectors.description:
Prerequisite: Level 9+ Warlock, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbinvPactTome00]{Pact of the Tome} Invocation

A new page appears in your @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.CwWbeQ6XyqFzbMYw]{Book of Shadows} when you conjure it. With your permission, a creature can take an action to write its name on that page, which can contain a number of names equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one name).

When any creature whose name is on the page is reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright, the creature magically drops to 1 Hit Point instead. Once this magic is triggered, no creature can benefit from it until you finish a Long Rest.

As a Magic action, you can erase a name on the page by touching it.

Foundry Note

The Protect activity consumes a use of its activity which refreshes every Long Rest.

The Write Name activity consumes a use of the item which can be used for tracking how many names you've written down.

The Erase Name activity will restore a use of the item and allows you to add another name.

Protect.name: Protect
Protect.condition: When any creature whose name is on the page is reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright

Gloom Stalker.name: Acechador en la Penumbra
Gloom Stalker.description:
Draw on Shadow Magic to Fight Your Foes

Gloom Stalkers are at home in the darkest places, wielding magic drawn from the Shadowfell to combat enemies that lurk in darkness.

Gloom Stalker Spells.title: Conjuros del Acechador en la Penumbra

Iron Mind.title: Mente de Hierro
Iron Mind.hint: You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws. If you already have this proficiency, you instead gain proficiency in Intelligence or Charisma saving throws (your choice).

Gloom Stalker Spells.name: Conjuros del Acechador en la Penumbra
Gloom Stalker Spells.description:
When you reach a Ranger level specified in the Gloom Stalker Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

The spells will be automatically granted as you level up.

Glorious Defense.name: Defensa Gloriosa
Glorious Defense.description:
You can turn defense into a sudden strike. When you or another creature you can see within 10 feet of you is hit by an attack roll, you can take a Reaction to grant a bonus to the target’s AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier (minimum of +1). If the attack misses, you can make one attack with a weapon against the attacker as part of this Reaction if the attacker is within your weapon’s range.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Glorious Defense.name: Glorious Defense
Glorious Defense.condition: When you or another creature you can see within 10 feet of you is hit by an attack roll

Goading Attack.name: Ataque Provocador
Goading Attack.description:
When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can expend one Superiority Die to attempt to goad the target into attacking you. Add the [[/damage @scale.battle-master.superiority.die]]{Superiority Die} to the attack's damage roll. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have Disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes activities for saving against your Strength or Dexterity. You can use the inline damage roll for the extra damage or the Damage activity.

The Damage activity allows you to select the type of damage it should deal in the roll dialog.

save.condition: When you hit a creature with an attack roll

Goaded.name: Goaded
Goaded.description: The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of your next turn.

Great Old One Patron.name: Patrón Primigenio
Great Old One Patron.description:
Sirve a una entidad cósmica incomprensible

Tu pacto es con un misterioso ser cuya naturaleza es completamente ajena a la realidad. Podrías no saber mucho sobre esta entidad, o podrías saber que es un horror que existe más allá de lo que la mente mortal puede comprender.

Great Old One Spells.title: Conjuros del Primigenio
Great Old One Spells.hint: The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Great Old One Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Eldritch Hex.title: Maleficio Sobrenatural
Eldritch Hex.hint: Your alien patron grants you a powerful curse. You always have the Hex spell prepared.

Great Old One Spells.name: Conjuros del Primigenio
Great Old One Spells.description:
The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Great Old One Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.
